resources.string: Dynamically changing wallpaper depending on the weather, season, time of day and location.
The application will automatically change the wallpaper on your smartphone depending on the weather, time of day and season.
Now you know what the weather is like outside right now!
The application will change the wallpaper every hour depending on the time of day, weather, and your location.
To make sure everything works according to plan, remember to:
After clicking the start button, you can minimize the application, but remember not to close it!
